item.description:
At a recent meetup we had shown a part of Dark Legacy - JFK and 9/11, which is a new film program produced by Flyby News. The program used an array of films and music in a sequence that could help break the spell of mind control for many. This is vital in order to deal with our current realities. The clips in this film are some of the best creative and insightful work posted on the web in the last 13 years.

 

"Dark Legacy: JFK and 9-11" will be available Online around 04 July  2012. It will be broadcast over community television, and distributed by such organizations as 9-11 Truth DVD Project. The two-part program will have total running time of about 2.5 hours. The film tackles the issue of 9-11 within the context that such an event and cover-up could never have happened unless other coup d'etats and cover-ups happened first.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Dark Legacy - JFK & 9-11 opens with a music video by Lowkey, Obama Nation. Part 2 opens with twenty minutes of John Hankey's film, Dark Legacy: George Bush and the Murder of John F. Kennedy. It is an honor to collaborate with such courageous and creative people. The film will be posted online at GCTV.org/videos under the Category: Flyby News. You can go there now to watch 5 previous programs.

Find this event on Facebook!

 

Please respond if you have any comments, especially on how to get this DVD seen by more people.
item.how_to_find_us: Online event.. but may meet in Northampton to discuss it..
item.name: World Premiere - Dark Legacy: JFK & 9-11
